meanings.definition: A type of navigational chart used by sailors.
meanings.sent1: The sailors relied on portolans to find their way across the vast ocean.
meanings.sent2: The ancient mariners carefully studied the portolans before embarking on their journey.
meanings.sent3: The captain joked that without the portolans, they would end up in the wrong continent.
meanings.sent4: The portolans were like treasure maps guiding the sailors to their destination.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details on the portolans helped the sailors navigate through rough waters.

meanings.definition: The study or collection of these navigational charts.
meanings.sent1: The museum curator specialized in the history of portolans.
meanings.sent2: Scholars dedicated years to the research of portolans and their significance in navigation.
meanings.sent3: The students found the subject of portolans surprisingly fascinating.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cartography, portolans were the stars of the show.
meanings.sent5: The professor's passion for portolans inspired many to delve into the field of maritime history.
